verses.name: Luke 11:42
verses.text: But woe unto you, Pharisees! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs, and pass over judgment and the love of God: these ought ye to have done, and not to leave the other undone.

verses.name: Luke 11:43
verses.text: Woe unto you, Pharisees! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues, and greetings in the markets.

verses.name: Luke 11:44
verses.text: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye are as graves which appear not, and the men that walk over them are not aware of them.

verses.name: Luke 11:45
verses.text: Then answered one of the lawyers, and said unto him, Master, thus saying thou reproachest us also.
